analysis.summary: The recipient_address field requires a complete mailing address for TONY LIU, with standard address validation and formatting to ensure deliverability.
insights: Field type is a standard postal address requiring multiple components (street, city, state/province, postal code, country)
The 'address_completion' hint suggests this may need autocomplete or address verification functionality
As a recipient address, this is likely critical for delivery or shipping purposes
Standard address validation should include format checks for postal codes and state/province abbreviations
recommendations: Implement address autocomplete using a service like Google Places API or similar for better UX
Use multi-field input with separate fields for street address, city, state/province, postal code, and country
Add real-time validation for postal/ZIP code format based on selected country
Consider implementing address verification to ensure deliverability
Make all address subfields required except for apartment/suite number
Store address components separately in the database for better querying and reporting
